info.title: Automatic Paint
info.detail: Automatically paint a given well formed SVG file.

info.pause: Click to start painting your picture!
info.park: Move the carriage back to the home position
info.disable: Raise brush and Unlock (disable) stepper motors, so that you can move the carriage by hand.
info.confirm: Are you sure you want to cancel the current print job and reset (for example, to start a new print job)?

status.title: Status
status.ready: Click to start painting your picture!
status.wait: Please wait while executed processes complete...

cncserver.unlockNotice: 'Motors unlocked! Place in home corner when done'
